name: Project 1024 - 1
description: This is #1 of a series of 1024 NFTs. One pixel will be added to each NFT. The initial buyer of the NFT determines the color and position of the next pixel 24 hours after purchase by tweeting @project_1024 the color code from htmlcolorcodes.com and position (up/down/left/right.) We will choose the color and position if we don't hear from the buyer after 24 hours.
